body.name: PERLESMITH Full Motion TV Wall Mount for 37-82 inch TVs up to 132 lbs, Max VESA 600x400mm, TV Bracket with Dual Articulating Arms, Tilt, Swivel, Extension, 16" Wood Studs, PSLFK1
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 7 hrs 19 mins
features: Universal TV Wall Mount: Full motion tv wall mount fits most 37”-82” TVs with VESA patterns 200x100mm to 600x400mm. Please verify the VESA pattern of your TV before purchase. Includes standard mounting hardware for easy installation. Wall mount bracket is compatible with most brands including Samsung, LG, TCL, Vizio, Sony, Panasonic, Toshiba, Sharp, Philips, JVC and more.

Strong and Sturdy: The dual articulating arms of this swivel and tilt tv wall mount are made with high-strength steel to support up to 132 lbs of weight. Compatible with 12”-16” wood studs, concrete, and brick wall mounting.

Enhanced Viewing Experience: The 65 inch TV wall mount bracket features +5°/-15° tilt to reduce glare, +/-60° swivel, and +/-3° leveling after installation. Easily optimize your viewing angle no matter where you are in the room.

Save Space: By extending up to 16.14" and retracting to 2.8" from the wall when not in use, this TV wall mount for 75+ inch tv screens is an effective way to save space by freeing up floor space for placing speakers and gaming devices.

Purchase with assurance: As we take pride in providing high-quality and high-performing full-motion mount bracket series. If you have any questions or require assistance, our friendly product support team based in the US is just a call away.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: PERLESMITH Large Full Motion TV Wall Mount | Upgraded Your Viewing Experience The PERLESMITH TV Wall Mount PSLFK1 is designed for 37-82 inch flat or curved TVs and is strong enough to support most TVs up to 132lbs.
Previous page Next page 1 Purchase Tips 2 Fits TVs Size & Max Load 3 Compatiable TV Vase Range 4 Installation Notes

Secure Large TVs PERLESMITH has been dedicated to producing high quality TV wall mounts for many years. We have a professional team of experts in this area that continue to improve and innovate products.

Mount your TV to achieve a sleeker look and free up more space. More importantly, mounting the TV will keep the unit further out of reach of children and pets, reducing the chances of tip-over accidents.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Sturdy...Very Well Documented...High Quality Product
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the : PERLESMITH Full Motion TV Wall Mount for 37-82 inch TVs up to 132 lbs. It is an extremely sturdy product. The installation was relatively simple and well organized and very well documented. They include pretty much everything that you might need to make the bracket work with your TV: an assortment of screws of different sizes to match the screw mounts on the back of your TV. The bracket is very solid...a bit heavy, but it's well made. They pretty much though of everything in the design of this product right down to the cutaway on the back next to the lag bolt hole so that you can screw it into the wall all the way down to the plate. They even have cutouts in the shape of arrows in the metal of the wall bracket so that you know which way is up when mounting the bracket.A very quality product. Well worth the extra few $$ over the price of a cheap-@$$ discount version. Take my advice -- spend the extra $10-$15.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars best value 37-75in wall mount
reviews.reviewText: i got this tv wall mount for my samsung 65 in oled tv. i put in a lot of thought before applying this set up. this had high ratings and the price was too good to stay away from. installation/instructions were easy to follow and the parts came in excellent condition. the only issue i had was on my end with the spacing of my wall. i had already measured the spacing of my "studs" with a magnet stud finder and it measured 16" apart, but when i started drilling, only one side had a stud, and i drilled right through the drywall on the other side. i ended up picking up a wall anchor toggle (metal, that holds up to 250lbs) from lowes and it held the mount fine. after that, everything else went smooth. although one thing i would advise is also leveling the front part (with the arms) because it does not say to level it in the instructions. to be honest, i was hesitant to finally mount my 65inch tv because it was heavy. my forearms still felt the pain 2 days later. my 65 inch tv weighs 52.2 lbs according to google. it may sound light for a tv, but manuevering that weight at that size required another person to help me. once we had the tv hooked on the mount with the brackets, the tilting bolts were already loose, so the tv was tilted all the way to the front. this was impressive because it showerd how strong the mount was even when the tv was leaning forward, away from the wall.overall, i am satisfied with my purchase and overall mounting setup because i normally do not like mounting tv, especially in apartments bc it feels permanent and i am the type to like to move furniture around from season to season, but my living apartment design does not have give many spacious arrangements, unless we mount the tv where we have it now. 5/5 recommended for anyone who wants a practical tv wall mount that swivels and tilts. i believe if your tv is over 50 inch, you should get the swivel function because i know it would be tough to deal with wiring for a tv that is bigger, so swiveling gives you better access. also, the stability is outstanding while i tilt, swivel and pull forward the tv. knowing the weight of the tv, i look at it mounted and i am really impressed with the stregnth and support of this tv wall mount.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The second one works perfectly
reviews.reviewText: This was easy to install, but wouldn't stay in position so I called and they sent a new one. It worked perfectly.So what I think is best about this item was the customer service and the responce in sending a new item. It's been exteremly sturdy and holds the TV in position like expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This tv wall mount is a very sturdy, and not too hard to put together and install. It is difficult to move once it is mounted. Maybe it will loosen up when it is broke in? I guess I will find out. Holds my 65" tv well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works Great With a 65 in TV
reviews.reviewText: Installation was easy, especially if you have another person to help hold things for measuring. You can still install this by yourself, but it just helps to have a second person. It comes with a lot of extra screws depending on the type of TV you have. It moves with ease if you have to turn the TV to the left or right. Tilting is easy to adjust, but I would definitely have a second person to help with that. It will be hard to hold the TV's position, while you try to tighten the screw in the back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We are now in our second house with these and absolutely love them! They are great quality and are so easy to install. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice TV mount
reviews.reviewText: Was a nothing to install and looks great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Got it for 65 inch samsung tv
reviews.reviewText: I've had this for a few weeks now and no problems. The TV swivels nice and smoothly side to side. I can pull it forward or backwards. My TV is a 65inch samsung.
Es bastante fácil de instalar, sólo debes tener la herramienta necesaria y saber usar un taladro.La tv se monta bastante fácil y rápido

reviews.reviewTitle: VALUE FOR MONEY AND GOOD PRODUCT!!
reviews.reviewText: Very well made, packaging and fully equipped with the necessary tools, HDMI and cable ties. Very valued for money!! Installation is a breeze with no problem at all
Excellent product, completely worth every cent and much more!
